Segment.name: PKL
Segment.comment: To identify the package level, quantity of stock-keeping units (SKUs), and other basic data related to the configuration of the package being defined

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: ItemDepth
Field.comment: The depth is the thickness of the product; in the dimension coordinate axes represented by X, Y and Z, depth is measured along the Z axis where X is the horizontal axis and Y is the vertical axis

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: GrossWeightPerPack
Field.comment: Numeric value of gross weight per pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: GrossVolumePerPack
Field.comment: Numeric value of gross volume per pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode4
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: C0508
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKL05 is present, then PKL08 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0608
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKL06 is present, then PKL08 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKL07 is present, then PKL08 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L08050607
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKL08 is present, then at least one of PKL05, PKL06 or PKL07 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PKL09 or PKL10 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PKL11 or PKL12 is present, then the other is required.
